review: 카페가 생겼네요 가끔 가는 미술관 카페가 생겼슴 좋겠다했는데 마침 생겼네요 메뉴가 많진 않고요 점심 메뉴(피자 오믈렛 라자니아)는 매일 변하는거같고 가끔미술관갈때 들르면 좋겠네요
review_en: I thought it would be nice to have an art museum cafe that I sometimes go to, but it just happened. I don't have a lot of menus. Lunch menus seem to change every day, so I'd like to stop by at the museum sometimes.

review: 종종 괜찮은 전시가 열리는 곳 전시를 하면 꽤 괜찮은 전시가 열리는데요. 단점은 평창동 자체가 대중교통이 발달한 곳이 아니라 대중교통으로 가기가 매우 번거롭다는 것입니다.
review_en: It's often a good exhibition. It's a pretty good exhibition. The disadvantage is that Pyeongchang-dong itself is not a place where public transportation is developed, but it is very cumbersome to go by public transportation.
